api_list.name: Get News From A Specific Newspaper
api_list.description:
Get news of specific newspaper ( Investing, Laa Tribune...)
List of newspaper ID available : bfm-bourse-trading-sat | le-point | investing | zone-bourse | les-echos | la-tribune
api_list.code:
import requests

url = "https://financial-news3.p.rapidapi.com/news/{newspaperid}"

headers = {
    "X-RapidAPI-Key": "SIGN-UP-FOR-KEY",
    "X-RapidAPI-Host": "financial-news3.p.rapidapi.com"
}

response = requests.get(url, headers=headers)

print(response.json())

api_list.name: Get All Financial News
api_list.description: This endpoint will return back all financial and economic news

import requests
